name: Baby Tuner
details:
TunerA high precision tuning micro pedals, can be accurate to 1 points
    Works with most Electric or Electro-acoustic instruments including seven string guitar or five string bass
    Display uses 108 high brightness LED's and is visible even in strong light
    Very small and compact design
    True bypass switch
http://www.mooeraudio.com/product/Baby-Tuner--96.html
